title: Why Mount Everest Became a Playground for the Ultra-Rich
description: With expeditions priced as high as $230,000, heated tents and Western chefs at base camp, Everest is now a luxury playground for the ultra-wealthy. Growing demand for Everest expeditions is the latest in a growing trend from the wealthy to seek out adventure in their travels. (Source: Bloomberg)
